description: Episode of Series "Developmental psychology today". Describes and portrays two major theories of cognitive development: Jean Piaget's developmental stage approach with its emphasis on maturational and environmental factors; and the cognitive learning or cognitive behavioural approach subscribed to by such developmentalists as Jerome Bruner, Jerome Kagan and Sidney Bijou. Suitable for tertiary and upper secondary levels.
